name: K-POP CLICK COIN
description: K-POP Click is a specialized community that combines blockchain technology with K-POP content, providing high-quality K-POP content services to global K-POP fandom. The K-POP Click platform offers various features, including a shopping mall where users can purchase a variety of K-POP content and related merchandise, a live commerce platform for selling individual products of celebrities, an NFT market related to artists, and more. The platform aims to provide verified K-POP charts, entertainment news, and other related content. KPOPCLICK is planning the "Click the Star" audition, offering opportunities for artists worldwide who want to promote K-POP, learn about it, and engage with the community.
